educircle.title: EduCircle
educircle.description: EduCircle is a collaborative platform where students and educators can join groups to study and work together. Users can post and interact in a dynamic newsfeed, authenticate via email, and receive certificates as PDFs through email.

kireitours.title: KireiTours
kireitours.description: Kirei Tours is a user-friendly web app where users can easily book tours and plan trips. The platform also emphasizes accessibility, ensuring everyone can navigate and use the site smoothly, while subtle GSAP animations enhance the interactive experience.
Features: User Login and Registration (Google and Facebook OAuth)

keeperlibrary.title: Keeper Library
keeperlibrary.description: Keeper Library is a powerful Content Management System for landing pages that allows users to change templates, edit content, and create pages entirely with GrapesJS—no coding required. It fetches content via APIs and renders pages dynamically, using client-side hydration to ensure all scripts and interactive elements work seamlessly. content, and create pages entirely with GrapesJS—no coding required. It fetches content via APIs and renders pages dynamically, using client-side hydration to ensure all scripts and interactive elements work seamlessly. The admin panel allows for easy management of content while the public website is for rendering the content.

tindahanPinoyPOS.title: Tindahan Pinoy POS
tindahanPinoyPOS.description: Tindahan Pinoy POS is a comprehensive Point of Sale system designed for small businesses. It features inventory management, sales tracking, and customer data handling, all within a user-friendly interface.
